description:
While the guards struggle to squelch a violent prison uprising, Luffy and his fellow fugitives try to keep their cool in a level of Impel Down known as Starvation Hell!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Chief Guard Saldeath`s Trap! Level 3: Starvation Hell!
Le piège de Saldeath, le chef des gardes. Le troisième cercle, l`enfer de la faim !
Roubanchou Saldeath no Wana: Level 3 Kiga Jigoku
Ловушка Сардеса. Третий уровень – Голодный ад
牢番長サルデスの罠 LV3・飢餓地獄
